### Description

The Canadian Forces School of Aerospace Control Operations (CFSACO) requires Remote Pilot Operators (RPO) services to support the training of Aerospace Controllers (AEC) and Aerospace Control Operators (AC Ops) students. The RPO will utilize the proprietary software programs ATTOWER Simulator, ATTOWERLite, and ATLIVE to deliver realistic training scenarios.

The RPO will be responsible for generating or modifying air traffic control scenarios, executing air traffic control instructions, and responding to voice prompts. They will also provide technical expertise on ATTOWERLite and ATLIVE to train instructors and students.

### Requirements

* Provide four (4) RPO Specialists working at a Basic Skill Level
* Provide one (1) RPO Specialist working at an Advanced Skill Level
* Meet the education and experience requirements outlined in the tender
* Demonstrate a complete understanding of military and civilian aviation operations and their pertinence to military air traffic control

### Terms and Conditions

* The proposed contract period is from 1 October 2024 to 30 September 2026
* The estimated cost of the contract is approximately $5,000,000.00
* The contract may be extended by three (3) years, one year at a time
